# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(ZeusMP)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
ZeusMPPluginInfo.C
ZeusMPCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
ZeusMPPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
ZeusMPMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtZeusMPFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
ZeusMPEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtZeusMPFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
${HDF4_INCLUDE_DIR} 
)

IF(WIN32)
  ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DMFHDFLIB_ -D_HDFLIB_)
ENDIF(WIN32)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS} ${HDF4_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IZeusMPDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IZeusMPDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IZeusMPDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MZeusMPDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES}    )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MZeusMPDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${HDF4_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MZeusMPDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MZeusMPDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EZeusMPDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EZeusMPDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser ${HDF4_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EZeusMPDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EZeusMPDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EZeusMPDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EZeusMPDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par ${HDF4_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EZeusMPDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EZeusMPDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_PREFIX(${INSTALLTARGETS})
